Manage Contacts¶

Contents

  • Manage Contacts

    • Adding Contancts

    • Listing Contacts

Contacts can be managed through an instance of contacts.Application, use contacts.Application.run() to execute any command like you would in the shell.

Adding Contancts¶

app.run("contacts add Name 0123456789")

Listing Contacts¶

app.run("contacts ls")

Name 0123456789
